title: christmas-movie-generator
description: Text Editor that uses webpack, service workers and manifest. This project included starter code, the main goals were to inject manifest, import the custom service worker and bundle with webpack.

title: DungeonsAndDevs
description: A full-stack education gaming app made with node and MySql. Where coding and fantasy merge in an epic learning adventure.

title: music-festival-hub
description: A full-stack MERN application. A one-stop shop to buy festival merch, buy tickets, connect with festival friends, design my own looks, post my own photos and experiences and get the latest updates
